info.name: YouTube Full Theater (New Design)
info.description:
Full screen theatre mode for new YouTube design (https://www.youtube.com/testtube)

Video in theater mode fills the entire window. Top bar is hidden, shown on hover.

Similar to YouTube Real Cinema Mode and YouTube - Real Theater Mode but supports the new YouTube redesign.
